marklogic.body:
If Al and Jesse keep this up it may contribute to Obama's defeat this fall.
Obama has already ticked the Catholics trying to meddle in Church affairs angering many. Now Al and Jesse and the gang are really going to tick many whites with this Martin case, plus many Libs are unhappy with Obama too.
The only group that favor what Jesse and Al are doing is the blacks who are going to vote for Barry no matter what so no Gain there.
This may become a big losing situation for Obama especially if Al and Jesse spark race riots and Burn a city or two down.
